name: 2 Meters Away
description:
Due to the Plague, Many people lost control of themselves and went running in the streets .

Some people between them are infected and can spread the disease.

The goal is to prevent that from happening and saving the earth

by keeping people safe from infected people and sending infected people to the hospital for isolation 
How to play:
drag and drop peope with mouse 
keep the infected people away from others and also send them to hospital
